name: The Omega Swan (formerly the Duckling)
traits: Resilient, sensitive, introspective, uncertain, gentle, courageous
background: Born different from the rest of the flock, ostracized and driven out for being an omega; endures hardship and loneliness before undergoing a transformation into a beautiful swan.
motivation: To find acceptance, belonging, and to understand its true identity and value.

name: Alpha Duck
background: Leader of the duckling's original flock, enforces social order and maintains the status quo, instigating the rejection of those deemed different.
motivation: To maintain dominance and purity within the flock, rejecting outsiders or those who do not conform.

name: Beta Goose
background: A goose from another flock who befriends the duckling during its time of need, offering kindness and guidance.
motivation: To offer support and friendship to those in need, acting out of compassion and a belief in inclusion.

name: Omega Duckling Siblings
traits: Conformist, uncertain, occasionally sympathetic, influenced by the flock
background: Hatchlings born alongside the protagonist, mostly conform to the flock’s social order but some may show brief moments of doubt regarding the ostracism.
motivation: To fit in and avoid becoming targets themselves, conflicted between empathy and self-preservation.

name: Mother Duck
traits: Protective, conflicted, loving, anxious, limited agency
background: Mother of the protagonist and its siblings, cares deeply but is pressured by the flock’s hierarchy and unable to protect her odd offspring.
motivation: To care for her young while keeping peace within the flock, torn between maternal love and social pressures.

name: New Omega Swan Friend
background: Another omega swan in the new flock, forms a bond with the protagonist through shared experience of difference.
motivation: To find connection and mutual support in a new, accepting community.

name: Beta Swan
background: A beta member of the new flock who helps facilitate the protagonist’s acceptance.
motivation: To promote harmony and support newcomers within the community.

name: Hostile Farm Animals
background: Various animals encountered after the duckling is driven out; reinforce the duckling’s sense of isolation through prejudice or mistreatment.
motivation: To defend their own social order, often acting out of ignorance or fear of difference.

name: Friendly Old Heron
background: An old heron occasionally glimpsed by the duckling, offers small moments of wisdom or observation.
motivation: To quietly observe and, at times, gently encourage the duckling’s perseverance.

name: Alpha Swan
background: Leader of the new swan flock, sets the tone for acceptance and inclusion.
motivation: To foster community and ensure that all members, regardless of background, feel valued.

name: Flock's Beta Enforcer
background: Alpha Duck’s main supporter; enforces the social hierarchy among the ducklings and drives out dissent.
motivation: To support the alpha’s leadership and maintain the flock’s established order.

name: Migrant Swans
background: Part of the new flock that welcomes the protagonist, represent the diversity and acceptance of the new life.
motivation: To build a supportive community for all swans, regardless of past status.

name: Jealous Duckling
background: A sibling or peer who is especially harsh to the protagonist, motivated by jealousy or fear of difference.
motivation: To deflect attention from their own insecurities by targeting the protagonist.

name: Kindly Old Beta Goose
background: An older beta goose who supports the protagonist and the younger beta goose, reinforcing a legacy of kindness.
motivation: To pass on the values of empathy and survival to the next generation.

name: Winter Fox
background: Predator encountered during the duckling’s winter hardships, represents one of the natural dangers faced.
motivation: Survival and hunger—acts as a test of the duckling's resilience.
